chat_welcome_message: Hello! I'm SEVY AI, and AI specialized in sex education knowledge. How can I help you today?
sevy_introduction: SEVY - SEX EDUCATION FOR VIETNAMESE YOUTH
sevy_introduction_content_line_2: We are a non-profit organization operating in Vietnam.
sevy_introduction_content_line_3: Our mission is to provide free, accessible, and age-appropriate sex education to every Vietnamese youth.
sevy_vision_content_line_1: We believe free and accessible sex education is a fundamental human right.
sevy_vision_content_line_2: SEVY will gradually bring sex education to every Vietnamese youth through in-person teaching in schools and online engagements with SEVY AI.
SEVY_AI_disclaimer: SEVY AI private assistant that can answer all sex-education-related questions. Your chat data is NEVER recorded by SEVY. By using SEVY AI, you understand that SEVY AI can make mistake. Consult with doctors or professionals for medical advice.
